concerns.name: Acne
concerns.description: A condition where pores become clogged, leading to breakouts.

concerns.name: Dryness
concerns.description: Lack of moisture that causes tightness and flaking.

concerns.name: Oiliness
concerns.description: Excess oil production that causes shine.

concerns.name: Sensitivity
concerns.description: Skin that reacts easily to products or environment.

concerns.name: Redness
concerns.description: Visible redness caused by irritation or sensitivity.

concerns.name: Large Pores
concerns.description: Visible pores often related to oil production.

concerns.name: Fine Lines
concerns.description: Small lines caused by dehydration or aging.

concerns.name: Dark Spots
concerns.description: Pigmented areas from sun exposure or acne.
